context: WEX operating three business segments: Fleet Payment Solutions, Travel and Corporate Solutions, and Health and Employee Benefits. In January 2020, announced $577.5M acquisition of eNett and Optal from Travelport to strengthen travel payments. Managing 14.9M vehicles globally across US, Canada, South America, Europe, Asia, and Australia.

competitors.name: FleetCor Technologies (Corpay)
competitors.notes: Primary competitor in fleet solutions with global scale, fuel cards, corporate lodging cards, and specialized payment services worldwide

competitors.name: U.S. Bank Voyager
competitors.notes: Comprehensive fleet management offering with extensive fueling and maintenance location acceptance network

competitors.name: Comdata
competitors.notes: Fleet management and corporate payment provider with fuel cards, spend cards, virtual payments, advanced technology integration

competitors.name: Edenred (UTA)
competitors.notes: Global payment solutions leader with strong fleet and mobility sector presence, offering fuel cards, maintenance, toll solutions

competitors.name: Visa
competitors.notes: Global payment network competing in travel and corporate payment sectors

competitors.name: Mastercard
competitors.notes: Global payment network with corporate payment infrastructure

competitors.name: American Express
competitors.notes: Corporate card and payment solutions provider

competitors.name: Fiserv
competitors.notes: Broader payment processing with corporate payment capabilities

competitors.name: Global Payments
competitors.notes: Payment processing company with B2B solutions

competitors.name: Optum Bank
competitors.notes: Healthcare HSA administrator competing in WEX health benefits segment

competitors.name: JPMorgan Chase
competitors.notes: Traditional bank with commercial card programs for corporate travel spend

competitors.name: Citibank
competitors.notes: Commercial card programs competing for corporate payments

competitors.name: Coupa
competitors.notes: Fintech specializing in B2B payments with integrated spend management and payment automation
